weekly_top_story.headline: Air Canada Flight Attendants Defy Back-to-Work Order Amid Strike
weekly_top_story.summary: Air Canada's flight attendants continue their strike despite a federal back-to-work order, exacerbating travel disruptions and highlighting tensions in labor relations.

stories.headline: U.S. Military Deployments in the Southern Caribbean
stories.summary: The U.S. military is deploying over 4,000 troops to the southern Caribbean, along with naval and air assets, under a mandate to target drug cartels in the region.

stories.headline: Zelenskyy Meets with Trump and European Leaders at the White House
stories.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy met with U.S. President Trump and European leaders to discuss ending the conflict in Ukraine, following a failed peace summit with Putin.
